action.text: Notwithstanding the passage of S. 1790, as amended, amendment SA 938 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 938 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S5466; text: CR S5466) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment agreed to: Notwithstanding the passage of S. 1790, as amended, amendment SA 938 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 938 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
